contentfulProjectEntry.title: Preperations for Ration Distribution in Mithi, Thar

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Alhamdolillah we have started sending help from this group to secure ration this week. Updates will not be rapid, but in sha Allah will share periodically

ğ–ğ¡ğšğ­: in this tragic situation of families effected by the COVID-19 situation where the bread earners have lost their job and source of income (labor work), we want to do our part by sharing our blessings with them.

ğ‡ğ¨ğ°: Partner with trusted sources to buy ration at affordable rates, and filter the candidates to identify deserving families, and gifting the ration to them

ğ„ğ¥ğ¢ğ ğ¢ğ›ğ¢ğ¥ğ¢ğ­ğ²: Sadaqah and Zakaat are accepted

ğ‚ğ¨ğ¬ğ­: Rs 2000 for a pack of ration covering a family of 7 for 2 weeks

Alhamdolillah we have started sending help from this group to secure ration this week. Updates will not be rapid, but in sha Allah will share periodically

ğ–ğ¡ğšğ­: in this tragic situation of families effected by the COVID-19 situation where the bread earners have lost their job and source of income (labor work), we want to do our part by sharing our blessings with them.
